::Hot Rod::Hot Rod realized that he had been talking a long time and it had=
 turned into a speech more then just conversation, so he stoped.

{Nightsha=
de}

    Nightshade chuckled shaking her head, "Same old Hot Rod, out to sa=
ve the universe even if that universe is a completely out of whack system."=
 Grinning she shrugged, "I tried the whole peaceful protest to the downgrad=
e, it didn't work. I assure you I didn't go predicon because it didn't work=
, no I tried rallying under the Autobot flag again and found most agreeing =
with the council. I was declared rogue and lumped alongside the predicons."=


   Sighing she shrugged sitting back on her cot looking at the bot before=
 her, "When Megatron busted out of the security detachment on that station =
and needed a crew I signed on only cause it was my only way off that statio=
n that didn't involve my spark being extracted to be stored in the criminal=
 division of cybertrons libraries like the combaticons. I couldn't continue=
 my fight without a body so I opted for the only chance I had."

    "It wa=
sn't the prettiest choice but it was the better of two evils."



------=_NextPart_000_0137_01C1F21B.69B6A1E0
